name: Chateau
description:
You have fallen through a portal into an unknown world. 
In order to escape, you must use the shadows to traverse an unknown environment.

Play as Pip, and travel along the light, or meld into the shadows to get closer to home.
While you are melded, you can climb up and across walls, move objects and adhere to moving platforms. 

Xbox Controller:
Joystick to Move
A to Meld/Unmeld

Keyboard and Mouse:
WASD to Move
Left Click to Meld/Unmeld
